    ReadFromStringError, ImageOutOfBoundsError, ColorValueError], tags: [].}
Parses the BMP Image from source string.

    ReadFromStringError, ImageOutOfBoundsError, ColorValueError],
    tags: [ReadIOEffect].}
Loads BMP file. 
proc saveBmp(img: ImgObj; filename: string; depth: uint16 = 32;
             compression: BitmapCompression = bmBiBITFIELDS) {.
    ...raises: [IOError, ColorValueError, ImageOutOfBoundsError],
    tags: [WriteIOEffect].}
Saves image as BMP. 
func toBmp(img: ImgObj; depth: uint16 = 32;
           compression: BitmapCompression = bmBiBITFIELDS): string {.
    ...raises: [ColorValueError, ImageOutOfBoundsError], tags: [].}

Encodes image to BMP. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BMP_file_format

Arguments:

  • depth - the number of bits per pixel, which is the color depth of the image.
    Typical values are 1, 4, 8, 16, 24 and 32.
  • compression - the compression method being used.
